job description:
Job Description
Located in NYC, we are an innovative, creative mobile app company and looking for a strong 3+ year Data Scientist with exceptional analytics skills to join our team. It is an exciting time to be part of our organization!

You will be a pivotal contributor in providing analysis in our applied data science efforts.

What you need:
  • 2+ years experience with predictive modeling, recommender systems, data and product analytics, data visualization
  • Proficiency with Python and SQL
What's in it for you?
  • Competitive Compensation plan
  • Full Benefits package, including Medical, 401k, and PTO
  • Excellent opportunity to grow with an Industry leader!
So if you are a Data Scientist looking for a NewGig, apply today!
